item.title: Ibrance (palbociclib), Kisqali (ribociclib), and Verzenio (abemaciclib): Drug Safety Communication - Due to Rare but Severe Lung Inflammation
item.description: FDA is warning that Ibrance (palbociclib), Kisqali (ribociclib), and Verzenio (abemaciclib) used to treat some patients with advanced breast cancers may cause rare but severe inflammation of the lungs.
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Zantac (ranitidine): Safety Information - NDMA Found in Samples of Some Ranitidine Medicines
item.description: FDA has learned that some ranitidine medicines, including some products commonly known as the brand-name drug Zantac, contain NDMA.
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Tetrahydrocannabinol (THC)-containing Vaping Products: Vaping Illnesses
item.description: Consumers are likely aware of the recent reports of respiratory illnesses – including some resulting in deaths – following the use of vaping products.The FDA is working closely with the CDC, as well as state and local public health partners to investigate them as quickly as possible.
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: E-Cigarette Products: Safety Communication - Due to the Incidents of Severe Respiratory Disease Associated with Use of an E-Cigarette Product
item.description: Both the U.S. Food and Drug Administration and the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention are working tirelessly to investigate the distressing incidents of severe respiratory disease associated with use of e-cigarette products.
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Hepatitis C Medicines (Mavyret, Zepatier, and Vosevi): Drug Safety Communication - Due to Rare Occurrence of Serious Liver Injury in Some patients with Advanced Liver Disease
item.description: FDA has received reports that the use of Mavyret, Zepatier, or Vosevi to treat chronic Hepatitis C in patients with moderate to severe liver impairment has resulted in rare cases of worsening liver function or liver failure.
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Xeljanz, Xeljanz XR (tofacitinib): Drug Safety Communication - Due to an Increased Risk of Blood Clots and Death with Higher Dose
item.description: Drug Safety Communication - Due to an Increased Risk of Blood Clots and Death with Higher Dose
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Fecal Microbiota for Transplantation: Safety Communication- Risk of Serious Adverse Reactions Due to Transmission of Multi-Drug Resistant Organisms
item.description: FDA MedWatch Alert regarding Fecal Microbiota for Transplantation: Safety Communication- Risk of Serious Adverse Reactions Due to Transmission of Multi-Drug Resistant Organisms
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: E-cigarette: Safety Communication - Related to Seizures Reported Following E-cigarette Use, Particularly in Youth and Young Adults
item.description: Safety Communication - Related to Seizures Reported Following E-cigarette Use, Particularly in Youth and Young Adults
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Certain Prescription Insomnia Medicines: New Boxed Warning - Due to Risk of Serious Injuries Caused by Sleepwalking, Sleep Driving and Engaging in Other Activities While Not Fully Awake
item.description: MedWatch Alert on certain prescription insomnia medicines.
item.dc:creator: FDA
